relation: Script to handle SOAP requests to manipulate ezmlm lists via HTTP POST
Mailing list manager start page PHP script
pageTitle: Ezmlm mailing list manager class: Web interface to manage ezmlm mailing lists. - PHP Classes
textBeforeTable: Manuel Lemos Web interface class to create and manage mailing lists with ezmlm. It features: - Displays a table with the lists already created, showing the list local and domain parts and the number of current subscribers. - Creation and alteration of list properties. - Alteration of list automatic message texts. - Support for list virtual hosts. - Multi-idiom Web interface. - Web service interface with SOAP protocol to control mailing list subscriptions remotely.     Author   Description Email, Web services BSD License ezmlmmanager 1.0.0     Categories   License   Version
